Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very likely that I will finish my career as Swiss national coach

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Every change in a team can turn into an opportunity for players to show themselves

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I am still hungry; I still hate defeats. There is no substitute for victories

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as there is a mathematical chance, we have to keep on going

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I can live without football. There are more important things in life

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never broken a contract in my career

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I am proud of my career

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: Laws are like sausages, it is better not to see them being made

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: People never lie so much as after a hunt, during a war or before an election

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: Never believe anything in politics until it has been officially denied

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: To retain respect for sausages and laws, one must not watch them in the making

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is the art of the possible

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: Be polite; write diplomatically; even in a declaration of war one observes the rules of politeness

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics ruins the character

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of politics? Make a good treaty with Russia

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: When you want to fool the world, tell the truth

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a Providence that protects idiots, drunkards, children and the United States of America

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: The sharp thorn often produces delicate roses

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: In our leisure we reveal what kind of people we are

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's a millionaire where promises are concerned

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is sorry to be honest for nothing

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is a fragile gift

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: Endure and persist; this pain will turn to good by and by

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: Art lies by its own artifice

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: What is without periods of rest will not endure

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: Let what is irksome become habitual, no more will it trouble you

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: Venus favors the bold

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all part of my journey - I've done a lot of stupid things, but you learn by your mistakes

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't be a royal. It's like living in a supersonic goldfish bowl

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: L.A.'s not a good place to grow old

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm dyslexic, I have attention-deficit disorder, and I've got something like a hereditary tremor

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: I got rabies shots for biting the head off a bat but that's OK - the bat had to get Ozzy shots

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew it was time to get off of reality TV when someone asked me if I sang as well as acted

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: Rock music is not meant to be perfect

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a liar, you've got to have a great memory, and I don't have a memory

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the things I've lost I miss my mind the most

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to fantasize that Paul McCartney would marry my sister

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: Flowers are happy things

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one cure for gray hair. It was invented by a Frenchman. It is called the guillotine

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: Few of them were to be trusted within reach of a trowel and a pile of bricks

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: I just sit at a typewriter and curse a bit

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: To find a man's true character, play golf with him

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: Why don't you get a haircut? You look like a chrysanthemum

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: He was white and shaken, like a dry martini

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: I could see that, if not actually disgruntled, he was far from being gruntled

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: She had a penetrating sort of laugh. Rather like a train going into a tunnel

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: To retire is to die

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: The most perfect technique is that which is not noticed at all

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: You must work - we must all work to make the world worthy of its children

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: The first thing to do in life is to do with purpose what one purposes to do

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of interpretation is not to play what is written

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: To retire is to begin to die

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of one's country is a splendid thing. But why should love stop at the border?

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel the capacity to care is the thing which gives life its deepest significance

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: Music will save the world

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing better than achieving your goals, whatever they might be

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really into food; it's one of my favourite things - everything from potato waffles to lobster

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with a thick eyebrow; Frida Kahlo had them

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes when you've got too much money you lose your imagination

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: We all get old, but I always say the skinny, pretty girls will be screwed

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: Dressing up is like therapy; I feel better in myself when I've made an effort

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy being a girl

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing living alone. I'm very lucky. It's like a refuge

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: Celebrity culture is an aspirational culture regardless of how much you don't want it to be

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everybody should focus on inner beauty

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: There are just certain realities about our world and I just happen to be creative within it

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be on top of everything, and the next minute, you're going to be on the bottom

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never considered myself to be beautiful, and I still don't

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: Me, sexy? I'm just plain ol' beans and rice

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, many people are engaging in same sex relationships and saying they are not gay

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always fun to put on bell bottoms and have your butt hanging out and hip huggers

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: But I just loved looking at the clothes of the '70s

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a movie once every four years and they call it a comeback

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: This whole beauty thing is something I've never comprehended

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: My people were homesteading in Colorado before Emancipation

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: What the eyes perceive in herbs or stones or trees is not yet a remedy; the eyes see only the dross

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: The dose makes the poison

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: Medicine rests upon four pillars - philosophy, astronomy, alchemy, and ethics

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: Thoughts create a new heaven, a new firmament, a new source of energy, from which new arts flow

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature also forges man, now a gold man, now a silver man, now a fig man, now a bean man

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: Often the remedy is deemed the highest good because it helps so many

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: The interpretation of dreams is a great art

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: This is alchemy, and this is the office of Vulcan; he is the apothecary and chemist of the medicine

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: This process is alchemy: its founder is the smith Vulcan

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what a woman looks like, if she's confident, she's sexy

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: The way I see it, you should live everyday like its your birthday

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people change when they think they're a star or something

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd imagine my wedding as a fairy tale... huge, beautiful and white

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there's ever been anyone like me that's lasted. And I'm going to keep on lasting

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I get half a million just to show up at parties. My life is, like, really, really fun

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Africa in general South Africa and West Africa, they are both great countries

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Wal-mart... do they like make walls there?

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really think, I just walk

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I couldn't stand back and watch the strong economy that my father envisioned go to ruins

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I will end the history of division and conflict through reconciliation and fairness

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I will open an era of grand national unity

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I know more than anyone the divergent views about my father. I want to be judged on my own merits

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - Different times need different types of leadership

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I want to be judged on my own merits

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - In human life, economics precedes politics or culture

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I have no family to take care of and no children to pass wealth to

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I will be the president of the nation who keeps pledges

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: The sound of a golf game is very different than the sound of a football game

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a twin brother, so I was around guys like a sister. It was comfortable to me

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen deer. I have lots of woodchucks on my property. And bluebirds. Foxes

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really weird to be taken seriously for what you're wearing. It makes me want to wear a uniform

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I like sitting close to windows

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm glad I'm Southern. I'm the Southerner who's very Southern in that she left to move to New York

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I care about being creative and expressing myself

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like this trend of songwriting that is honest and intelligent and serious and longing

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of a robot in a way. Or a Tron

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't say I was a queen. Maybe a little elf

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: The food that enters the mind must be watched as closely as the food that enters the body

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: As polarized as we have been, we Americans are locked in a cultural war for the soul of our country

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: Defeat has its lessons as well as victory

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: No one has deputized America to play Wyatt Earp to the world

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: Saying the Washington Post is just a newspaper is like saying Rasputin was just a country priest

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: Anti-Catholicism is the anti-Semitism of the intellectual

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: McCarthy emerged in the person of Senator Russ Feingold of Wisconsin

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: If a country forgets where it came from, how will its people know who they are?

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: Parents have a right to insist that godless evolution not be taught to their children

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: The Bay of Pigs became a metaphor for feckless folly and failure

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: Without music, life is a journey through a desert

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an article of faith that the novels I've loved will live inside me forever

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: A recipe is a story that ends with a good meal

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: Love came in wounded and frantic ways to my dismaying family

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: I have found human nature a bit contradictory in my living of it. Human life is incredibly strange

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always a version of me who is the narrator. And I make myself look better than other people

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: My father's violence is the central fact of my art and my life

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: I still get weepy when I see a father being nice to his child. It so affects me

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: I love books about treks and journeys into the unknown

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that my mother, Frances Dorothy Peck, modeled her whole life on that of Scarlett O'Hara

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I have a basic sound aesthetic that is in most of what I do

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I represent a more left-wing view of what jazz is

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: It's more about conception and touch and spirit and soul than whether my hardware was in place

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening is the key to everything good in music

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: The beauty of jazz is that it's malleable. People are addressing it to suit their own personalities

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: What I look for in musicians is a sense of infinity

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: From 1962 to 1965, the guitar became this icon of youth culture, thanks mostly to the Beatles

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate the way chorus boxes sound

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized that equipment really had little to do with why I sound like the way I sound

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw A Hard Day's Night 12 or 13 times

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep down, I happen to be very shallow

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: A gun is a necessity. Who knows if you're walking down a street and you spot a moose?

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: Will I obliterate national debt? Sure, why not?

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: We have nothing to fear but fear itself... and, of course, the boogieman

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I am neither left wing nor right wing. I am middle-of-the-bird

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: In America, any boy can grow up to become president. Or, if he never grows up, vice president

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're old enough to be arrested, you're old enough to carry a gun

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's tough campaigning, kissing hands and shaking babies

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The No. 1 cause of forest fires is trees

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've upped my standards. Now, up yours

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: A champion needs a motivation above and beyond winning

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as coulda, shoulda, or woulda. If you shoulda and coulda, you woulda done it

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Being ready isn't enough; you have to be prepared for a promotion or any other significant change

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Discipline is not a nasty word

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Giving yourself permission to lose guarantees a loss

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a part of success is more important than being personally indispensable

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let other people tell you what you want

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: People who create 20% of the results will begin believing they deserve 80% of the rewards

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: Are we a Christian nation now? It's doubtful. But did we start out as one? Without question

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a zero tolerance for sanctimonious morons who try to scare people

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: People who hate God... take it out on innocent people

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: And I think that George Bush really is a very godly person

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't want to be President now!

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Katrina matter was terrible

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: McCain I'd vote against under any circumstance

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I know one man who was impotent who gave AIDS to his wife and the only thing they did was kiss

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: In Europe, the big word is tolerance. You tolerate everything

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean the terrorists are - are like a pimple, like a boil. They'll go away

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Survival was my only hope, success my only revenge

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the root of all evil is abuse of power

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: My friends call me Miss Worst Case Scenario

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: In the first person, the readers feel smart, like it's them solving the case

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if you are a best-seller you feel insecure because it is all so unpredictable

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always believed human blood is red because it really needs to draw attention to itself

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I dropped chemistry. I practically blew up the lab in college

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, it does not deter crime, the death penalty

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to sit on my laurels

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's really beautiful weather, sometimes I might take a helicopter out. I got my license in 1999

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: It has been a motto of mine my whole life - just be yourself

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always prided myself on being myself and trying to stick true to who I am and how I was raised

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to score goals, and I love to plan my celebrations

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some guys you definitely would not want dating your sister - especially hockey players

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't be face-washing anyone in real life. I'd be skating to the bench real fast to get away

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was bigger I might not have had the same skill set as I do, the speed

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: It's obviously disappointing and surreal when you see someone else win the Stanley Cup

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I owe it to myself to put my best effort forward and prove how good I can be

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: We're here to win. We're not here just for the experience

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I always go home to Buffalo in the offseason. I really enjoy my home town

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I am a Leo. Lion is a giant part of me

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep my heart and my soul and my spirit open to miracles

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to shut up and let my angels speak to me and tell me what I'm supposed to do

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: When it looks like I may live longer than five minutes I'll drop cigarettes like a hot potato

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to screw up somebody's life is to give them what they want

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: As always, I appreciate all the love and support people have sent and continue to send my way

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to believe that I've got a lot of guardian warriors sittin' on my shoulder including my dad

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: The longer your life goes on, the more death you face

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: Good-looking people turn me off. Myself included

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: Together we can make a world where cancer no longer means living with fear, without hope, or worse

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to do my first record I ever made, A Church, a Courtroom, and Then Goodbye

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing I wanted to do more than anything else was sing country music

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: Sitting around the house playing the wife and mother is driving me crazy

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems that every time I stick my neck out, I get my foot into something else

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I've become a captive of my own ambitions

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not gonna ride home in the car. I'll wait for Randy. I think I'll get home quicker

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm gonna walk a little bit of dog

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm gonna be something one of these days

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't miss a night's work and let my public down

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: Carnegie Hall was real fabulous, but you know, it ain't as big as the Grand Ole Opry

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: That is your legacy on this Earth when you leave this Earth: how many hearts you touched

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes strength to make your way through grief, to grab hold of life and let it pull you forward

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: After September 11, I got to understand a little bit of his deep love for this country

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I needed to run away in order to come home

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I had this odd sibling rivalry with America

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, if you hang around this earth long enough you really see how things come full circle

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people, when they die, leave so much life behind that we wonder how they did it

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I was such a punk

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a child, our summer days were spent swimming; chlorine in my hair was like perfume to me

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: It used to be a lot easier to get a book deal

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile at a stranger. See what happens

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love chickens

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: The word diva to me means doing something supernatural with something natural

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: The theater is a tough place. It's not cushioned the way it is in film and television

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Madonna is a wonderful performer

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not show-business people. We have a life

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't listen to the contemporary pop artists. They all sound alike, anyway

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite band was The Band, and nobody compares in my mind with The Band

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what it means to have a leading part, and I know what it means to have a featured part

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to do situation comedy - it's the best job in show business

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: To get rid of depression, I swim with dolphins

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: If I weren't a matchmaker, I'd be a chef

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an advocate for gay marriage. I have more gay friends than Carter has pills

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very quiet and shy in my personal life, as hard as that is to believe

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: I have put gay dating on the map

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of Hollywood couples get married young and wind up growing out of their relationship

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to date another millionaire. I've never done that

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a breast reduction

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to practice Wicca

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: It hit me really hard that I want kids in my life

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: If you hit a midget on the head with a stick, he turns into 40 gold coins

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: I fantasize and idealize myself as Bugs Bunny, but I know deep down I'm Daffy Duck

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: George Bush is not stupid. He's evil. OK? There's a huge difference between stupid and evil

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: I think right now is the best time for stand-up, ever. I sincerely do
